name: Calamos Wealth Management
description: Calamos Wealth Management is a leading investment management firm specializing in multi-asset investment strategies. Founded in 1977 by John P. Calamos, Sr., the firm has a rich history of providing innovative investment solutions that seek to enhance client wealth and achieve long-term financial goals. Based in Naperville, Illinois, Calamos offers a diverse range of investment products, including equity, fixed income, and alternative strategies. The firm prides itself on its disciplined investment approach, which integrates fundamental research with a focus on risk management. With a commitment to client-centric service, Calamos serves a wide array of clients, including high-net-worth individuals, families, and institutional investors. The firm's investment philosophy is centered around the belief that successful investing requires a combination of innovative thinking and time-tested principles. In addition to its investment management services, Calamos provides comprehensive wealth planning solutions, including tax planning, estate planning, and retirement strategies. The firm's dedication to transparency and education helps clients navigate complex financial landscapes and make informed investment decisions. By leveraging its expertise and experience, Calamos Wealth Management continues to adapt to changing market conditions while striving to deliver superior performance and client satisfaction.
